content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello, Mary Smith. I am pleased to have the opportunity to discuss the rental price for this apartment with you. Please tell me what you believe is a fair price for the apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Well, considering the size of the apartment and the location, I would say a fair price would be around 800 Euro per month.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your offer, Mary Smith. While 800 Euro per month is a reasonable price, I must admit that I was hoping for a higher offer. However, I am willing to negotiate. Would you be willing to increase your offer slightly?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, I can see your point. I would be willing to increase my offer to 850 Euro per month. I think this reflects a fair balance between the value of the apartment and my budget as a student.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Mary Smith. Your offer of 850 Euro per month is closer to my expectation. However, as a landlord, I am always looking to secure the best deal for my property. Would you be willing to meet me halfway and offer 900 Euro per month?
name: Heinrich Heine
